about_the_game:
Life after death is a direct continuation to two of Island of Aito’s hidden endings; “An isolated incident” and “Mortem sibi consciscere”.

Aito wakes up to a horror he could have never imagined. The island’s beautiful blue skies have turned crimson, lit by a hollow moon that never sets. Murderous beings follow Aito everywhere he goes. His only hope is to redeem his soul with the help of a female demon.

Will Aito prove worthy of a second chance or is he destined to suffer in hell for all eternity?

• Decision-based gameplay
• Creepy horror-themed atmosphere
• Spooky soundtrack
• 3 different endings

content_descriptors.notes: Please note that this game contains depictions of violence, injuries and suicide, partial nudity, alcohol use and strong language. Therefore it is not suitable for children or those easily disturbed.
